short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters out political content on X based on community votes, allowing users to customize their feed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "No More Politics Please" is a Chrome extension that empowers users to filter out political content from their X feed. Using community-driven voting, it allows users to collaboratively identify and hide unwanted political tweets. The extension seamlessly integrates with X's interface, adding a thumbs-down button to each tweet for easy voting. Voted tweets are instantly hidden from your feed, and once they cross the community vote threshold, they will be hidden for all users. Built with privacy in mind, it only tracks tweet IDs, and no user information whatsoever.
